About TJS2

TJS2 is an object-oriented scripting language developed for the purpose of being embedded into applications. It also possesses characteristics of non-object-oriented languages, allowing it to be written in a way that is easy for the developer.
The syntax is similar to JavaScriptTM and JavaTM, making it easy to learn.

About this manual

This manual explains TJS2 from a grammatical perspective.
It also describes the classes and methods that are pre-provided in TJS2.
